short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables YuJa Panorama visualizations for end users. This includes alternative formats, analytics gauges and accessibility reports.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables Panorama visualizations for applicable Learning Management Systems. Capabilities include alternative formats, document accessibility reports and analytics gauges. 

You may need to visit the Panorama LTI-based application from within your LMS in order to activate the extension.
